title: IDEOLOGIES OF THE ANCIENTS 3 Philip
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary:
In part 3 of the series, I look at how the Persian empire ended. Setting the stage I go into huge detail on theories of ancient warfare, warrior societies, & cover the backstory of Philip of Macedon.

Support on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PoliticalPhilosophyPodcast

Website: https://www.politicalphilosophypodcast.com/
